params.amount: The amount of tokens to donate

params.token: The token address to withdraw (address(0) for native currency)

returns._0: Array of donations in the specified range
Array of donation indices for the donor

params.token: The token address (address(0) for native currency)

returns._0: Total amount donated for the token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.token: The token address to whitelist/remove (address(0) for native currency)
params.whitelisted: Whether to whitelist or remove the token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

donateToken(address,uint256).notice: Donate ERC20 tokens to the contract owner

donorDonations(address,uint256).notice: Mapping to track donations by donor address

emergencyWithdraw(address).notice: Emergency function to withdraw any accidentally sent tokens

getDonorDonations(address).notice: Get donations by a specific donor

getTotalDonatedForToken(address).notice: Get total amount donated for a specific token

isTokenWhitelisted(address).notice: Check if a token is whitelisted

setWhitelistedToken(address,bool).notice: Whitelist or remove a token from the whitelist
